==Links of Interest== *[http://www.emtec-international.com/de-eu/old_drivers Drivers on '''Emtec''''s site] ([http://www.emtec-international.com/sites/default/files/drivers/wifi100.zip Direct Link]) *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/168984-airport-like-app-for-ralink-2870/page-5 ''Airport-like app for Ralink 2870'' on the '''InsanelyMac''' forums] :The USB ID appears to be [[148f]]:2573
